        public java.util.regex.Pattern concatTemplate(int min,
                                     int max,
                                     java.lang.String prefixReg,
                                     java.lang.String regexSep,
                                     java.lang.String suffixEnd)
        concatenate this pattern with themselves subclasses can override this method Default do nothing
        Parameters:
        min - minimal repetition
        max - maximum repetition
        prefixReg - prefix before the concatenation start
        regexSep - separation regex between the repetition
        suffixEnd - suffix
        Returns:
